metadata.title: CVE-2024-38591 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/hns: Fix deadlock on SRQ async events.xa_lock for SRQ table may be required in AEQ. Use xa_store_irq()/xa_erase_irq() to avoid deadlock.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
